section_list.section_description: High-quality CNC milling for your machining projects.
We offer top-notch CNC turning services for your machining projects.
Drilling with precision and efficiency using advanced CNC machining.

Milling.description_1: Dachuan is a network of over 10,000 worldwide qualified CNC milling manufacturers. That means that whatever production needs you have, we can always offer a shop and machine that will satisfy them. We usually use 3-, 4- and 5-axis CNC machines. 6- and 7-axis machines are also available in our network and can be used upon request.
Milling.description_2: Dachuan gives you instant pricing, quick lead time, and design-for-manufacturability feedback for your CNC milled parts.
Milling.advantage_title: Advantages of Dachuan's CNC Drilling service

Finishing.name: As-Milled
Features: This is a finish option with the fastest turnaround. Parts are left with visible tool marks and potentially sharp edges and burrs, which can be removed upon request.

Finishing.name: Coating services
Features: Anodizing: Hard & Colour (Black Hardcoat, Black, Blue, Gold, Gray Hardcoat, Green, Natural Hardcoat, Natural, Orange, Red)

Finishing.name: Custom
Features: Additional processing and finishes on request.

Sumerise.Sumerise_description_2: CNC milling is a technology of computer-controlled (CNC) machining. It uses a cutter to remove material from a solid workpiece. The commonly used CNC milling machines in the industry are of two types
Sumerise.Sumerise_description_3: 3-axis (X, Y, Z orientation) , 5-axis (X, Y, Z + A – rotational axis around X, B – rotational axis around Y)

Turning.description_1: Translation Dachuan manufacturing network covers more than 10,000 manufacturers in China and worldwide, equipped with CNC machine tools and CNC turning centers, possessing the production capacity and capabilities required for customer projects, and providing competitive prices and lead times
Turning.description_2: We utilize machine-learning trained technology to provide real-time manufacturability feedback, ensuring that the components meet your requirements and optimizing the CNC turning process. Our on-demand manufacturing platform is capable of providing high-quality metal or plastic turning parts, with quantities ranging from single prototypes to hundreds of thousands of parts.
Turning.advantage_title: Advantages of Dachuan's CNC Turning service

Sumerise.Sumerise_description_2: CNC turning is a technology of computer-controlled machining that produces parts by rotating a solid workpiece, while fixed cutting tools remove material from the workpiece and shape the final part. All the actions are performed automatically according to the CAD models uploaded to the CNC lathe.
Sumerise.Sumerise_description_3: Learn more about CNC machining from our guide.

Drilling.description_1: We provide CNC drilling services for the fabrication of both small and large series of parts of any complexity. We use various types of drill presses (upright, bench, radial), which allows us to drill holes of both simple and complex patterns up to 7 cm in diameter. The fabrication is possible with metals and alloys (aluminum, steel, copper, and others) and polymers.
Drilling.advantage_title: Advantages of Dachuan's CNC Drilling service

Sumerise.Sumerise_description_1: CNC drilling is a technology of CNC machining that uses a computer with a pre-uploaded CAD file to execute the process of drilling holes in a workpiece. The advantages of CNC drilling are high precision both of the patterns and holes and scalability of ready parts.
